about_the_game:
Liquor and Wine Shop Simulator Demo takes you on a relaxing journey through the charming streets of France, where you'll run your very own wine and liquor shop! In this chill store management game, you'll start as a humble cashier, scanning items, giving the correct change, and earning your way to the top. But that's just the beginning—design and decorate your store with French-inspired elegance, from rustic wooden wine racks to stylish décor that will attract connoisseurs from far and wide.

Please note this is the demo version of the game. You will start with a store, which you can purchase drinks, shelfs and more however you can only play for Day 1. If you want to the full version you can check out the full game on steam!

Liquor and Wine Shop Simulator - Game Features:

  • Start as a Cashier – Begin your journey as a cashier in a quaint French wine shop, where you'll scan items, give the correct change to customers, and build your business from the ground up.

  • Manage Your Store – Take full control of the shop's operations, from ordering supplies and stocking shelves to setting competitive prices and offering special promotions.

  • Stock Wine & Liquor – Curate a wide selection of fine wines and spirits. Discover the best local French vineyards and distilleries, and choose what to stock based on customer demand and quality.

  • Wholesale Purchases – Buy your stock in bulk at wholesale prices, finding the best deals to maximize profit while keeping a well-balanced inventory.

  • License System – Start with basic wines and liquors, but as you grow, you’ll need to purchase licenses to sell heavier and more exclusive spirits, expanding your product range.

  • Set Your Own Prices – Determine your store's pricing strategy. Choose to offer premium products for higher profits or attract more customers with competitive prices.

  • Custom Shop Design – Fully customize your shop's interior with a variety of French-inspired décor, shelving, and layouts to make your store stand out and appeal to your clientele.

  • Financial Management – Monitor your profits, losses, and expenses. Manage your budget wisely to afford upgrades, licenses, and expansions.

With a balance of strategy, creativity, and a little chaos control, Liquor and Wine Shop Simulator offers a chill yet rewarding experience as you sip your way to success!
